{% extends "base.html" %} {% comment %} This template serves as an intermediary intended for easier incorporation of the provided ksp_login views and templates into a project. The templates used by ksp_login views all extend this base template and override its ksp_login_title and ksp_login_content blocks. This makes it easy to make the template extend your specific base template, whatever its name, and include the content provided by those templates wherever required. {% endcomment %} {% block title %}{% block ksp_login_title %}{% endblock ksp_login_title %}{% endblock title %} {% block content %} {% block ksp_login_content %} {% endblock ksp_login_content %} {% endblock content %}
